text: Can we give permission for CRM Cards to only specific HubSpot roles/users ?

Reminder: If you’re attending INBOUND 2021, closed captioning, transcripts, and AudioEye are available. If you need an American Sign Language Interpreter, we do need to know in advance.  Details on these accessibility accommodations and registration for ASL interpreter are available at: <https://help.inbound.com/article/25-accessibility>
